amendment.description: To extend the sunset for the Congressional Commission on the Strategic Posture of the United States to require an additional report.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1774 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1774 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8013-8014) To extend the sunset for the Congressional Commission on the Strategic Posture of the United States to require an additional report.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1774 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Kyl.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1774 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
